publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2270 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motionâ€”That the Parliament agrees (a) that the Justice 2 Committee reports to the Justice 1 Committee by 28 January 2005 in relation to the Solicitors (Scotland) Act 1980 (Compensation for Inadequate Professional Services) Order 2004 (SSI 2004/550); and (b) that the Justice 1 Committee reports to the Justice 2 Committee by 28 January 2005 in relation to the Title Conditions (Scotland) Act 2003 (Notice of Potential Liability for Costs) Amendment Order 2004 (SSI 2004/552). Supported by: Tavish Scott*
